job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: Aureon Aureon is a leading business solutions provider who connects possibilities to productivity by providing unique and scalable business and technology services for organizations – small and large. Headquartered in the heart of the Midwest, Aureon offers a comprehensive suite of support services, with a focus on business solutions, technology and consulting services.  This creates many unique career and growth opportunities for our employees! Data Scientist ESSENTIAL DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES: Provide confident marketing strategy guidance to business leaders and sales teams using multi-touchpoint consumer data Employ analytical and data-driven approach to determine greatest potential opportunities for marketing messaging; this includes soliciting marketing research to augment or validate existing knowledge about our customers, markets, and solutions Generate prescriptive insights to improve marketing effectiveness Develop efficient and accurate analytic models to answer business strategy questions Collaborate with Corporate IT Data Analytics team to develop reporting capabilities and Power BI dashboards Produce dashboards and reports using Power BI, CRM, and other Company data systems. Use first- and third-party data to assist with development and implementation of targeted market strategies Create and maintain monthly reports and metrics in areas including Client acquisition, retention, product penetration, cross-sell opportunities, and segmentation metrics. Review and at times create and standardize best practices for reporting, including benchmarking and appropriate data usage Evaluate marketing campaign results and provide post-campaign ROI and Attribution analysis to improve and optimize future tactics and strategies EDUCATION, TRAINING, AND EXPERIENCE: Minimum of 5 years of related experience with a Bachelor's degree; or years 1-3 and a Master's degree; or- equivalent experience Comfortable in basic statistical analysis, modeling, clustering, and data mining techniques to identify trends and insights Demonstrable experience with strategic marketing campaigns or complex strategic initiatives Experience with CRM systems, Power BI and marketing analytics data management strongly preferred Significant experience with business-to-business marketing, advertising, or consumer analysis General knowledge of information technology, telecommunications, or related industries and terminology is helpful REQUIRED SKILLS: Ability to work under limited supervision and work independently on projects Utilize work experience and judgment to plan and accomplish goals Excellent interpersonal skills to establish and maintain effective relationships with customers, employees, and business contacts in a professional, timely and courteous manner Excellent written and oral communication skills, including demonstrated persuasiveness Ability to perform multiple tasks simultaneously, often changing assignments on short notice Ability to adhere to strict confidentiality standards Ability to present information to various groups in a variety of formats, including professional presentation skill TOOLS, EQUIPMENT, AND SOFTWARE: Experience with contact management and/or inbound marketing software highly preferred Ideal candidate will demonstrate proficiency with using marketing data (CRM data, response data, digital analytics, etc.) to drive continuous improvement Experience with data visualization software Experience with digital marketing environments and principles preferred WORKING CONDITIONS AND PHYSICAL REQUIREMENTS: Primarily indoor work in an office environment requiring long periods of sitting Frequent utilization of manual dexterity and visualizing of a computer screen No unusual physical requirements
